thread.section_title: Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Petite but Great
thread.title_full: Petite but Great - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dewi M
title: Petite but Great
text:
Room is cozy, though small. Anyway - it suited us who needed place to rest in the evening.
The staff served us with cocktail in the afternoon in the living room next to reception - which was nice thing to enjoy, especially after roaming around Paris in the morning - and before going out again in the evening.
Breakfast is standard, but staffs were very friendly. Felt like having breakfast at home. Dining room is tiny, but.. it serves the function of us getting our stomach filled before getting out and enjoy Paris.
